name: THNK_GeckosServer
shortDescription: A THNK adapter to provide a server via geckos.io (IP & Port).
description: A THNK adapter to provide a server via [geckos.io](https://geckos.io). Geckos servers are bound to the local machine's networking: you connect to one using your machine's IP address and a port number (preferably 4 digits long).
NOTE: The geckos servers will only work on previews and PC builds. Preview support is currently windows-only.

// Load THNK Geckos Server Adapter (https://github.com/arthuro555/THNK)

eventsFunctions.description: Hosts a THNK server on the local machine. Does not work on web or mobile builds.
eventsFunctions.name: HostServer
eventsFunctions.sentence: Host scene _PARAM2_ on a local server on port _PARAM1_

parameters.description: The port to host the server on
parameters.name: Port

parameters.description: The scene to start the server on.
parameters.name: Scene
